$schema.description: The JSON schema to validate this file against.

auto_temp_mute.description: Automatically, temporarily mute ingame chat messages if we think someone else in the server is running the tool.

auto_launch_tf2.description: Controls whether TF2 will automatically be launched when TF2BD is opened.

local_steamid_override.description: The SteamID of the player running the tool. Overrides the auto-detected value.

tf_game_dir_override.description: The local tf directory. Overrides the auto-detected value.

steam_dir_override.description: The local installation directory of Steam. Overrides the auto-detected value.

steam_api_key.description: The user's Steam Web API key from https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey.

sleep_when_unfocused.description: If true, the tool reduces its update rate when not focused to reduce CPU/GPU usage.

allow_internet_usage.description: Allow this program to connect to the internet.

program_update_check_mode.description: Automatically connect to the internet and check for updates via Github. Does nothing if allow_internet_usage is false.

oneOf.description: Automatically check for updates and prompt the user if a new release is available.
Automatically check for updates and prompt the user if a new release OR preview is available.
Disable auto-update completely. You can still check for updates manually through the Help menu.

scoreboard_racism.description: Color to flash rows on the scoreboard for players marked as racist.

scoreboard_cheater.description: Color to flash rows on the scoreboard for players marked as cheaters.

scoreboard_suspicious.description: Color to flash rows on the scoreboard for players marked as racist.

scoreboard_exploiter.description: Color to flash rows on the scoreboard for players marked as racist.

scoreboard_you.description: Color to highlight your SteamID on the scoreboard.

scoreboard_connecting.description: Color to highlight connecting players on the scoreboard.

friendly_team.description: Color to use for your team.

enemy_team.description: Color to use for the enemy team.

items.description: A site that appears in the "Go To" menu when right clicking on a user.

name.description: Name of this site (shows in menu).

profile_url.description: URL for visiting profiles. Allows you to specify replacements like https://steamcommunity.com/id/%SteamID64%. Valid replacements are %SteamID64%, or %SteamID3% for [U:1:XXXXXX].
